item.description:
We tried this last month and has a nice turnout, it's a good way to meet like-minded people and eat some yummy food while we're at it. This is a pot luck affair, so bring a salad, appetizer, or dessert, AND something to throw on the grill (if you want) and your favorite beverage. Again we'll be offering the challenge of a LOW/NO tech Sunday to bring awareness to the distraction that can occur with the use of technology (participation optional). Please join us in mindful community as we seek to gain great awareness and acceptance towards lasting peace and joy.

Mapquest Link
item.name: No/Low Tech Pot Luck Cookout
